column4: I have a tough one...... I have a mother board... totally screwed up...BIOS deleted.... the only code that excecute is the boot-block function on the BIOS chip...and it tries to boot from floppy......I have loaded GRUB on a floppy... can I boot a livecd or a OS in the hdd?
unless GRUB can boot from a CD...
at the GRUB prompt grub> I type 'root (' and then <TAB> and the only device listed is fd0
